preconditions.precondition: Repository Manager wants to update component name.

mainSequence.step: Access component update form - Repository Manager
Request current component details - DIMS Interface
Query current component information - Component Management System
Display current component information - Component Management System
Input new component name - Repository Manager
Validate new name and prepare update - DIMS Interface
Update component name - Component Management System
Confirm update to Repository Manager - Component Management System
Display update confirmation to Repository Manager - DIMS Interface
